ModMetaData.name: [JDS] Star Wars Phase II Clone Armor
ModMetaData.author: JangoD'soul
ModMetaData.description:
This mod add StarWar:clone war armor set
Note: no CE patch
[h1]Features:[/h1] -Phase II Standard Armor Set -Phase II Scout Armor Set -Phase II Cold Assault Armor Set -Phase II Pilot Suit Set -Phase II Desert Armor Set -Phase II ARF Helmet -Phase II AT-RT Helmet -Phase II BARC Helmet -Phase II Engineer Helmet -Phase II Heavy Helmet -Phase II Ops Helmet -Phase II Paratrooper Helmet -Coruscant Guard Armor Set -104th Battalion Armor Set -21st Nova Corps Armor Set -187th Attack Battalion Armor Set -501st Battalion Armor Set -212th Attack Battalion Armor Set -41st Elite Corps -327th Star Corps -332nd Battalion
[h1]Crafting Requirements:[/h1] -Craftable -Research Requirements: Phase II Clone Armor
[h1]Plans:[/h1] -To add Phase II Patterns
[h1]Credits:[/h1] -Preview art inspires by "Star Wars - Factions"
